ygData.subject: RE: Re: The Brass Kilij and the silly little sand giant
ygData.msgSnippet: Well my friend wasn t on for once :) so I ll have to ask her tonight.  She musta been hit by a bus or something for her to miss a night of EQ. Crier
ygData.messageBody:
Well my friend wasn't on for once :) so I'll have to ask her tonight. She
musta been hit by a bus or something for her to miss a night of EQ.

Crier

> From: Eric Boller <eboller@...>
>
> I've heard that that sand giant in question appears as
> just "sand giant"--not "a sand giant". That is how
> your friend could tell, I believe. Having not found
> that stupid sand giant, I can't verify as of yet.
>
> Thex Luteslinger (Tunare)
>
> >
> > No, not really. I just know when I see him he's
> > blue instead of white or
> > yellow. However, I zoned into SRo the other day and
> > saw a blue SG. A 33rd
> > DE Necro girlfriend was with me and I said "Hey
> > there he is! Let's toast
> > him!" and she said "That's not him." How she knew I
> > don't know because he
> > was blue to her too. I'll ask her tonight if I
> > remember to.
> >
> > Crier Sharpsong
